channel.title: Hayk Manasyan's Projects
channel.description: Recent content on Hayk Manasyan's Projects

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a high school senior interested in learning tools for exploring data to answer interesting questions. I like working on creative challenges that require non-standard solutions. I enjoy learning world languages and culture and play two musical intruments.

item.title: Maryland Car Sales Data Analysis Report
item.description: The report summarizes the trends in new and used car sales in Maryland. This is my first data analysis report after I learned R and RStudio in June 2020.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.
